pull.title: test: check that peer is connected when calling sync_*
pull.body: Without a connection there is no way to sync, so we can fail early and don't have to wait for the timeout

events.body:
ACK fac3716b09bb9

Ran the p2p tests twice compared to master and they don't appear to be slowed down by this change -- they actually ran a few seconds faster.

issue.title: Bitcoin PR tracking
issue.body: The main purpose of this issue is to keep track of Pull Requests on Bitcoin since version 0.19.1 identifying those which make a porting LitecoinZ.

issue.title: RPC & Mempool back ports.
issue.body:
More back ports and adaptations over the RPC values parsing and mempool. We need to get closer in this area :) .

* bitcoin#6715
* bitcoin#6915
